name: Smash Donuts PRO
description:
Download Smash Donuts PRO (very cheap) and play with the Donuts!!!

PRO Special Contents:

- Extra Themed Worlds (during special holidays)
- No Adds
- 40 Bonus Diamonds

Venture in different candy worlds when the funny Donuts, always fashion dressed, will appear on your smartphone ready to be smashed and squashed.

Tap and smash as much as you can until the time is over and reach the goal for the next level.
Many levels with different settings where you must smash the Donuts, compose puzzles, collect bonus but also avoid (don't tap) the Evil Donuts!!

A super entertaining game, for men and women, young and old!!

Download it, you won't change your mind!!!

- Very Cheap
- Many levels in many different worlds
- Play without any wifi connection
- No Facebook or email login required
- Three different languages available (english, spanish, italian).
